name: verifyai-extension
description: AI-powered fact-checking browser extension for social media videos

scripts.build: npm run build:chrome && npm run build:firefox
scripts.package:chrome: npm run build:chrome && cd dist/chrome && zip -r ../verifyai-chrome.zip .
scripts.package:firefox: npm run build:firefox && cd dist/firefox && zip -r ../verifyai-firefox.zip .
